author: eptwts
text:
many people make the mistake of assuming something can't be "easy" just because it isn't for them...

for many people this is not an easy task at all, but that's not everyone...

you can bet your life that there are 1000's of people out there for whom turning their idea into a $30k/month app is super easy

it's never good to think that your own experience dictates everyones reality...

i started an aff experiment 7 days ago & it's on track for $15k/month - guess what? it was stupidly easy
